title: Revenue Model Conversions
description: Revenue Model Conversions is the output of Post attributed conversions after applying common adveristing industry models.

xdm:searchEngineId.title: Search Engine Identifier
xdm:searchEngineId.description: The application-specified identifier used to identify the Search Advertising Platform Name

xdm:campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
xdm:campaignId.description: Campaign Identifer on the advertising platform

xdm:placementId.title: Placement Identifier
xdm:placementId.description: Placement ID on the display advertising platform. It will be populated only for non-search advertising related campaigns

xdm:adgroupId.title: Ad Group Identifier
xdm:adgroupId.description: Ad Group ID on the search advertising platform

xdm:adId.title: Ad Identifier
xdm:adId.description: Ad ID on the advertising platform

xdm:term.title: Search Term
xdm:term.description: Search Term that contributed to the conversion

xdm:termId.title: Search Term Identifier
xdm:termId.description: Search Term ID on the search advertising platform

xdm:matchType.title: Term Match Type
xdm:matchType.description: Match Type associated to the Search Term being targeted for the Ad

xdm:propertyName.title: Property Name
xdm:propertyName.description: Property Name Configured by Pixel, Analytics, Custom Feeds

xdm:modelName.title: Model Name
xdm:modelName.description: Unique Name of the advertising attribution Model. Examples include Last Event, First Event, Even Distribution

xdm:clickThroughCount.title: Click Through Count Model Attribution
xdm:clickThroughCount.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Count for attributed models if trigger event is Click

xdm:clickThroughValue.title: Click Through Value Model Attribution
xdm:clickThroughValue.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Value for attributed models if trigger event is Click

xdm:viewThroughCount.title: View Through Count Model Attribution
xdm:viewThroughCount.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Count for attributed models if trigger event is Impression

xdm:viewThroughValue.title: View Through Value Model Attribution
xdm:viewThroughValue.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Value for attributed models if trigger event is Impression

xdm:clickviewThroughValue.title: Click View Through Value Model Attribution
xdm:clickviewThroughValue.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Value for attributed models if trigger event is click but impressions present in path

xdm:clickviewThroughCount.title: Click View Through Count Model Attribution
xdm:clickviewThroughCount.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Count for attributed models if trigger event is click but impressions present in path

xdm:viewclickThroughValue.title: View Click Through Value Model Attribution
xdm:viewclickThroughValue.description: Raw Conversion Value for attributed models if trigger event is impression but clicks present in path

xdm:viewclickThroughCount.title: View Click Through Count Model Attribution
xdm:viewclickThroughCount.description: Raw Conversion Count for attributed models if trigger event is impression but clicks present in path

xdm:conversionType.title: Conversion Type
xdm:conversionType.description: Feed Conversion Type indicates where the conversion event originated from - examples client, analytics, cross device

xdm:device.title: Device
xdm:device.description: The device from where the ad was displayed
